00021         public function edit($id =null) {
00030                 #               $this -> load -> view('header_view');
00031                 if (isset($id)) {
00032                         $gpxfile = $this -> gpxfiles_model -> get_gpxfile($id);
00033                         if (isset($gpxfile)) {
00034                                 $file_user_id = $gpxfile['userId'];
00035                                 $file_uname = $this -> users_model -> get_username_by_id($file_user_id);
00036                         } else
00037                                 $file_uname = NULL;
00038                 } else
00039                         $file_uname = null;
00040 
00041                 if ($file_uname == NULL) {
00042                         $data = array('title' => 'Error', 
00043                                 'msg' => "You must specify a valid GPX File ID to edit it!");
00044                         $viewdata = array('main_content' => 'message_view', 'data' => $data);
00045                         $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $viewdata);      
00046                 }
00047                 elseif(!$this -> users_model -> isValidNamedUser($file_uname) && 
00048                         !$this -> users_model -> isValidAdmin()) {
00049                         $data = array('title' => 'Error', 'msg' => "You must be logged in as the owner of the file, or as an Administrator to edit a file.");
00050                         $viewdata = array('main_content' => 'message_view', 'data' => $data);
00051                         $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $viewdata);
00052 
00053                 } else {
00054                         if($this -> input -> post('submit')) {
00055                                 foreach($_POST as $key => $value) {
00056                                         $post_data[$key] = $this -> input -> post($key);
00057                                 }
00058                                 $id = $this -> input -> post('id');
00059                                 $data = $post_data;
00060                                 $this -> gpxfiles_model -> update_gpxfile($data['id'], $data['userId'], $data['description'], $data['GPXFile']);
00061                                 $data['query'] = $this -> gpxfiles_model -> get_gpxfiles();
00062                                 $viewdata = array('data' => $data, 'main_content' => 'gpx_list_gpxfiles');
00063                                 $this -> load -> view('include/site_template', $viewdata);
00064                         } else {
00065                                 if($id == null) {
00066                                         $data = $this -> gpxfiles_model -> get_default_gpxfile();
00067                                         $data['userId'] = $this -> session -> userdata('user_id');
00068                                         $data['uname'] = $this -> users_model -> get_uname_by_id($data['userId']);
00069                                 } else {
00070                                         $data = $this -> gpxfiles_model -> get_gpxfile($id);
00071                                         if(isset($data['userId'])) {
00072                                                 $data['uname'] = $this -> users_model -> get_username_by_id($data['userId']);

00136                 $data['query'] = $this -> gpxfiles_model -> get_gpxfiles();
00137                 $query = $data['query'];
00138                 if($this -> input -> get('ajax')) {
00139                         foreach ($data['query']->result() as $row):
00140                                 $res[$row->id]=$row->id." - ".$row->description;
00141                         endforeach;
00142                         echo json_encode($res);

00181                         if($this -> input -> post('submit')) {

00184                                         $post_data[$key] = $this -> input -> post($key);
00185                                 }

00200                                 } else {
00201                                         #echo "file upload success";

00206                                                 if($this -> session -> userdata('logged_in') == 1) {

00210                                                 }
